name: Women Who Pivot \ Life Source

jv_history.partner_name: How to Pivot Without Losing Yourself with Jeannette Reyes and Mona Abdi
jv_history.source_quote: you know it’s time to make a pivot, but you aren’t sure what comes next. Today’s conversation will help guide ... In the next installment of the “Breaking the Rules” series, I’m talking all things piv

what_you_do: Yvonne Lee-Hawkins is pivoting from wellness-only work into career coaching, because that's what people are asking for, and because it's where wellness and real life collide.
who_you_serve: High-performing, thoughtful people who are quietly asking themselves big questions about their careers.
offering: Career coaching to help people understand their value clearly, translate their experience with confidence, make intentional moves instead of reactive ones, and navigate change without burning out.
business_focus: Helping people make strategic career pivots and transitions in a sustainable way.
